commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
class Position():
    
    def __init__(self, point_y, point_x, cardinal):
        self._cardinal = cardinal
        self.axe_y = point_y
        self.axe_x = point_x
    
    def avance(self):

        #avancement enfonction de la direction
        if self._cardinal == "Sud":     self.axe_y += -1
        if self._cardinal == "Nord":    self.axe_y += 1
        if self._cardinal == "Est":     self.axe_x += 1
        if self._cardinal == "Ouest":   self.axe_x += -1

        #verification qu'il soit toujours sur la map
        if self.axe_x > 10:     self.axe_x == 10
        if self.axe_x < 0:      self.axe_x == 0
        if self.axe_y > 10:     self.axe_y == 0
        if self.axe_y < 0:      self.axe_y == 10


class Rover(Position):

    def __init__(self):
        self._cardinal = "Nord"
        self.axe_y = 5
        self.axe_x = 5
        self.position_actuel = self.axe_y, self.axe_x, self._cardinal


##########   tests   ###########
rover = Rover()

print(rover.position_actuel)

rover.avance()

print(rover.position_actuel)

### attendu => (6, 6, 'Nord') ###
